author: Dan Cancian
title: Which NBA Players Have Recovered From Coronavirus?
description: Boston Celtics guard Marcus Smart is the latest player to have recovered from coronavirus after receiving the all-clear on Friday.
content:
Boston Celtics guard Marcus Smart announced he has recovered from coronavirus after testing positive two weeks ago.
On March 19, the Celtics confirmed Smart had contracted COVID-19the disease caused by the new strain of coronavirusbut the 26-year-old has sin… [+2818 chars]
